para: Please send all comments and suggestions regarding this manual to Xiphos Development list xiphos-developers@lists.sourceforge.net. Comments may also be submitted via the project trackers at SourceForge.

For more information on Xiphos, please visit the project website at http://xiphos.sf.net. Bug reports should be made using the Bug Tracker at the project development site
http://www.sourceforge.net/projects/xiphos
